ygData.subject: RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had 119 mr when i dueled a lvl 50 cleric friend of mine. I resisted everything. EVERYTHING. I just sat there and watched him waste his entire mana bar on
ygData.messageBody:
>
> In a recent duel with a L50 cleric, with an MR 109, I resisted
> Flash of Light, Stun, Holy Might, and two other stuns they get.
> The guy couldn't get one utility spell off on me. Then we
> tried offensive damage spells. This is where is got all F'd up.
>
> Retribution. normally does what? 530ish dmg?
>
> Mystic: MR 109, first cast 100 dmg, second cast 300 dmg (full hit).
> Ele/Gu: MR 161, first cast 200 dmg, second cast 250 dmg.
>
> Never once did I outright resist the spell. Resistances are
> very cloudy in my mind for dmg based effects right now.
>
> Harmonic.
>


I had 119 mr when i dueled a lvl 50 cleric friend of mine. I resisted
everything. EVERYTHING. I just sat there and watched him waste his entire
mana bar on me. Blind, fear, dd, stun - whatever. 100% resistance. Man i
felt sorry for him =)

When he ran out of mana i stripped his buffs and chain/feared him to death lol

Gendal Concorden, lvl 50 Bard
Enoch Lyciferous, lvl 50 Necro
Colet Khrusallis, lvl 27 Cleric
Tunare - www.norrath.org
